name: Finsupp.coe_mul
initialProofState:
α : Type u₁
β : Type u₂
inst✝ : MulZeroClass β
g₁ g₂ : Finsupp α β
⊢ Eq (⇑(HMul.hMul g₁ g₂)) (HMul.hMul ⇑g₁ ⇑g₂)
decl:
theorem coe_mul (g₁ g₂ : α →₀ β) : ⇑(g₁ * g₂) = g₁ * g₂ :=
  rfl

name: Finsupp.mul_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u₁
β : Type u₂
inst✝ : MulZeroClass β
g₁ g₂ : Finsupp α β
a : α
⊢ Eq ((HMul.hMul g₁ g₂) a) (HMul.hMul (g₁ a) (g₂ a))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mul_apply {g₁ g₂ : α →₀ β} {a : α} : (g₁ * g₂) a = g₁ a * g₂ a :=
  rfl

name: Finsupp.single_mul
initialProofState:
α : Type u₁
β : Type u₂
inst✝ : MulZeroClass β
a : α
b₁ b₂ : β
⊢ Eq (Finsupp.single a (HMul.hMul b₁ b₂)) (HMul.hMul (Finsupp.single a b₁) (Finsupp.single a b₂))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem single_mul (a : α) (b₁ b₂ : β) : single a (b₁ * b₂) = single a b₁ * single a b₂ :=
  (zipWith_single_single _ _ _ _ _).symm

name: Finsupp.support_mul
initialProofState:
α : Type u₁
β : Type u₂
inst✝¹ : MulZeroClass β
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
g₁ g₂ : Finsupp α β
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HMul.hMul g₁ g₂).support (Inter.inter g₁.support g₂.support)
decl:
theorem support_mul [DecidableEq α] {g₁ g₂ : α →₀ β} :
    (g₁ * g₂).support ⊆ g₁.support ∩ g₂.support := by
  intro a h
  simp only [mul_apply, mem_support_iff] at h
  simp only [mem_support_iff, mem_inter, Ne]
  rw [← not_or]
  intro w
  apply h
  cases' w with w w <;> (rw [w]; simp)

name: Finsupp.coe_pointwise_smul
initialProofState:
α : Type u₁
β : Type u₂
inst✝ : Semiring β
f : α → β
g : Finsupp α β
⊢ Eq (⇑(HSMul.hSMul f g)) (HSMul.hSMul f ⇑g)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_pointwise_smul [Semiring β] (f : α → β) (g : α →₀ β) : ⇑(f • g) = f • ⇑g :=
  rfl
